title: A spoon, a rock and some oil: These are some of the objects to be used in King Charles III's coronation
description: Each of the objects used in the coronation of King Charles III is meant to help seal the bond between the monarch, the people, the church and God.

title: Behind the ancient coronation traditions as King Charles is blessed, anointed and crowned
description: LONDON — While King Charles III, 74, has ruled since his mother, Queen Elizabeth II, died in September, on Saturday he will be crowned monarch of the United Kingdom of Great Britain and Northern Ireland, also becoming the largely ceremonial head of the Commonwealth.

title: Putin will face a war crimes court, Zelenskyy tells the International Criminal Court
description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy said he was convinced that his Russian counterpart Vladimir Putin would face an international war crimes court when Ukraine wins the war.

title: Putin will face an international war crimes court, Zelenskyy says
description: Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelenskyy said on Thursday he was convinced that his Russian counterpart Vladimir Putin would face an international war crimes court when Ukraine wins the war that has been raging for over a year.

title: Israeli forces kill 3 Palestinians wanted for killings near a Jewish West Bank settlement in April
description: Israeli troops on Thursday killed three Palestinians wanted in connection with a deadly attack last month on a car near a Jewish West Bank settlement that killed a British-Israeli mother and two of her daughters.

title: The pendant is 20,000 years old. Ancient DNA shows who wore it.
description: Inside a Siberian cave that has been an archeological treasure trove, an elk’s canine tooth — pierced to become a pendant — was unearthed by scientists with care to avoid contaminating this intriguing artifact made roughly 20,000 years ago.

title: Singer Lionel Richie joins Charles and Camilla at a Buckingham Palace garden party
description: King Charles III and Camilla, the queen consort, hosted a garden party at Buckingham Palace to mark the upcoming coronation ceremony.

title: Israeli forces kill wanted Palestinians in West Bank
description: Israeli troops on Thursday killed three Palestinians wanted in connection with a deadly attack against Israelis, the military said.

title: International bust of notorious Italian mafia group leads to 132 arrests
description: Authorities say a total of 132 people across 10 countries were arrested in a raid on one of Italy’s most notorious organized crime groups, the ’ndrangheta. Europol called the massive international bust the "largest-ever coordinated hit" against the group.
